summary: Implements default plugin classes for dataset, group, and organization forms, permission label handling, and translation configuration, and supplies utility functions to register, look up, reset, and set default plugin implementations. These defaults serve as fallbacks for core CKAN functionality such as form rendering, schema generation, access control, and internationalisation when no custom plugin is provided.
business_intent: Provide a complete out‑of‑the‑box set of form, permission, and translation behaviors that keep the platform functional while allowing extensions to override or extend specific aspects via the CKAN plugin system.
